bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Deploy an API with a handler bug on a single GPU machine with a 1 GPU resource request Wait for the failure status Fix the bug and redeploy
<denchmark-h:h3>Actual Behavior</denchmark-h>
Failed API takes a long time to terminate and the compute resources are not available for the updated API. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
Updated API deploys quickly.
